description: Jane is an administrative assistant at the bustling law firm of Carter & Goldstein and keeps a personal Notion notebook titled "Life's Musings."
relationship: Emily is Jane's recently matched pen pal from the service Pen Pals United. At work, Jane interacts daily with attorneys and staff at Carter & Goldstein. In her personal life, she is processing the emotional aftermath of a past three-year relationship that ended due to her partner’s infidelity.
